44229.title: Extraordinary with Fareed Zakaria
44229.description: Billy Joel has sold more than 150 million records and received the Gershwin Prize for Popular Song from The Library of Congress. From his home in southern Florida, Zakaria and Joel talk the inspiration behind Joel's megahits, and more.

44230.title: Extraordinary with Fareed Zakaria
44230.description: Francis Ford Coppola was only 31 years old when earned the first of his 8 Oscar nominations. Zakaria's interview comes during the 50th anniversary of The Godfather release. Coppola also reflects on creative pursuits from wine to watches.
